key_terms: Purpose: Benefit the Association and advance its not-for-profit mission
Scope: Identify and acknowledge Company as a supporter
Term: Commences on March 15, 2018 and expires on March 14, 2020
Intellectual Property: Association is the sole owner of its name and logos
License: Non-exclusive, limited license to use Association Marks
Indemnification: Each Party agrees to defend and hold harmless the other
Confidentiality: Provisions maintained as confidential during and after the Term
Governing Law: Subject to laws of the Commonwealth of Virginia
